CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: summon snow man
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef} is able to partially control snow. {PAWN_pronoun} can create snow from moisture in surrounding air and animate it.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: grind body
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef}'s body is riddled with corrupt archites. {PAWN_pronoun} can release them at will, creating a cloud of deadlife dust which can reanimate nearby corpses.
